basics.name: Jehu Shalom Amanna
basics.label: Engineer
basics.summary: A mechanical engineer by training, who fell in love with computer engineering

work.name: Manipal Digital Systems
work.summary: I automate the difficult processes. I helped people to utilize themselves in a much more efficient way. I used JavaScript and Python as tools.

work.name: Niveus Solutions
work.summary: I built a reporting dashboard for a bank. Refactored a complex codebase to simple and modular, resulting in less time to add features and 1-2 engineers for development.

work.name: Ford Pro Charging (Powered by Electriphi)
work.summary: We managed electric fleets. I was responsible for building an email and push notification system and generating reports of the very large quantities of electric charge utilization.

work.name: Microsoft
work.summary: Modernization of a very old internal legacy system. I built a module that made use of micro-frontend and a custom React extension that fulfilled many needs, including localization and internalization.

work.name: QuillBot
work.summary: In a short time, built a module, including writing test cases using Playwright, that was part of an internal CMS tool that helped all the stakeholders in the company to participate in building and managing the product.

work.name: Niveus Solutions
work.summary: I take care of multiple clients' frontend-related problems.
